name: NOP.Project.Architecture
observations: FastAPI backend + React frontend + Docker infrastructure
Multi-protocol remote access (SSH, VNC, RDP, FTP)

name: Frontend.Traffic.AdvancedPing
observations: Multi-protocol ping support: ICMP, TCP, UDP, HTTP, DNS
hping3 integration for crafted packets with routing info
Asset dropdown with live filtering by IP/hostname
Protocol-specific tools: ping, hping3, curl, dig
Raw terminal output display for detailed analysis

name: Frontend.Scans.AssetSelection
observations: Asset dropdown with auto-filtering by IP/hostname
Online/offline status indicators with color coding
CIDR notation support for subnet scanning (/24, /32)
Filter controls: status (all/online/offline) and IP search
Auto-complete from asset inventory when typing target
Multi-host scan capability with batch selection

name: Frontend.Common.FilterPersistence
observations: Assets page: statusFilter and subnetFilter persistence
Scans page: statusFilter and ipFilter persistence
Traffic page: activeTab and packet filter persistence
Filter state restored on page reload/navigation
Namespace: nop_*_filter for each page context

name: Frontend.Traffic.PacketCapture
observations: Real-time network packet sniffing via WebSocket
BPF filter support for targeted capture
Packet inspection with hex/ASCII dump view

name: Backend.Services.PingService
observations: ICMP: Standard ping with RTT statistics
TCP: hping3 SYN packets with verbose routing data
UDP: hping3 UDP packets with routing information
DNS: dig queries to test DNS server responsiveness

name: Frontend.AccessHub.VaultFeature
observations: Password-protected credential vault with group management
Three sorting modes: Recent, Frequent, Name
Cyberpunk-styled UI with green accents and geometric symbols

name: Frontend.AccessHub.ConnectionManagement
observations: Resizable connection area with drag handle

name: Frontend.AccessHub.GroupManagement
observations: Group selector dropdown with custom styling
Add new groups via modal interface

name: Backend.Services.AssetService
observations: Provides asset list endpoint with filtering

name: Backend.Docker.Tools
observations: traceroute and tcptraceroute for path analysis
